scripts.download-seadragon: wget https://github.com/openseadragon/openseadragon/releases/download/v2.4.1/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && tar -zxvf openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && rsync -a openseadragon-bin-2.4.1 public/openseadragon && rm openseadragon-bin-2.4.1.tar.gz && rm -r openseadragon-bin-2.4.1
scripts.copy-new-static: rsync -a dist/static/* ../web/static && cp dist/index.html ../web/classifier/templates && cp public/openseadragon/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1/*.js ../web/static/js && cp -r public/openseadragon/openseadragon-bin-2.4.1/images/* ../web/media/ && cp -r /tmp/os_select/picturae-openseadragonselection-c4a980f/images/* ../web/media && rsync -a /tmp/os_select/picturae-openseadragonselection-c4a980f/dist/*.js ../web/static/js
scripts.build: npm run download-seadragon && npm run download-seadragonselect && vue-cli-service build && npm run remove-old-static && npm run copy-new-static
